insert into calendar(cal_num, m_num, w_num, cal_type, cal_start_date, cal_end_date, cal_title, cal_content, cal_regDate, cal_annually, cal_monthly, cal_yearCalendar, cal_color) values(#{cNum}, #{mNum}, #{wNum}, #{type}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{annually}, #{monthly}, #{yearCalendar}, #{color})
mapper.select: select rownum, cal_title, cal_content, m_name, cal_start_date, cal_end_date from (select rownum as rnum, cal_title, cal_content, m_name, cal_start_date, cal_end_date from (select rownum, c.cal_title, c.cal_content, m.m_name, c.cal_start_date, c.cal_end_date from calendar c, member m where c.m_num = m.m_num and c.w_num=#{wNum}) where 1=0 or cal_title like ('%'||#{title}||'%') or cal_content like ('%'||#{content}||'%') or m_name like ('%'||#{mName}||'%') or 1=1 order by cal_start_date asc) where rnum between #{firstRow} and #{endRow}
